title: When someone takes your position in league
body: To be honest i hate it when someone calls the position first and someone else calls it after and doesn’t care at all about it and goes your position it’s really silly and I got banned because of it.

replies.body: Not green in team recruitment, not my 'official' area.

You wouldn't have been banned for someone else doing something, but if you flamed them for it then that's on you. You're judged on your behaviour, and yeah, stealing someone's role is a shitty thing to do, and is report worthy, but that doesn't give you a license to do whatever you want to them.

If you want community feedback I would recommend posting the whole story, so the reason for your ban and the logs/evidence you were given to support it in your reform card.

Wait really!? i dont think this is fair at all maybe some further detail should be looked at before going ahead to ban someone, such as looking at the chat logs. Also maybe you shouldve reported them instead providing evidence also. And instead of inting (which is just a guess, i imagine you would'nt) you couldve just played the roll that was left over
